content: last-minute yo-yo bookmark e j kirkwood whip up a classroom s-worth of party favors in a few minutes make them up in your school or team colors use holiday colors for stocking stuffers and valentine goody bags or use the leftovers from another project supplies yarn one yard each of two colors one dark and one light a yarn needle for pulling the fringe apart a crochet hook in the appropriate size fingering/size 1 b/2 25 sport/size 2 c/2 75 dk/size 3 d/3 25 worsted/size 4 f/3 75 terms chain chain double_crochet double_crochet us sl slip st slip set up chain 4 slip_stitch into last chain st to form a ring and lay tail over the ring so you can work around the tail in the first round round 1 color 1 ch2 work 11 double_crochet around both the ring and the yarn tail slip_stitch into top of the ch2 then cut your yarn 12/30cm out and pull that tail through the slip_stitch round 2 color 2 leaving a 12 tail slip_stitch into the first st ch2 slip_stitch into the same st repeat this all the way around slip_stitch into the first st cut your yarn leaving a 12 tail and pull through finishing trim your starting yarn tail at the center of the ring tie a knot in the three 12 tails then braid them and knot again at the end trim if necessary so they re all the same length separate the plies at the end of the braid with the tip of yarn needle last-minute yo-yo bookmark e j kirkwood last-minute yo-yo bookmark e j kirkwood last-minute yo-yo bookmark e j kirkwood last-minute yo-yo bookmark e j kirkwood
